reviewText: Great movie, everybody should watch it.
As good as I remembered, great performances from the actors, especially Jon Voigt & Eric Roberts.
one of the worst video and audio quality DVD disc that I ever attempted to watch ever, I have seen better home made movies in 8 mm

You know it's a good movie with great acting when recognized actors like Jon Voight and Eric Roberts put on a show and you forget who they are. Action from the start picks up its pace until the very explosive ending.
I ordered this movie for a friend and he just loved it.  I found the price to be just right.

I like rodeo movies and I had ta have this movie which I saw a few years ago. I was waiting for it to come out on dvd. Jon Voight does a excellent job in this movie I thought. If ya like rodeo at all, this is a good buy.
Great movie I love Jon Voight
Had been looking for "Runaway Train" for years.  Glad to have finally found it!
Good movie..only problem there were some issues such the DVD. Some parts in the movie froze.
Runaway train is a breathtaking Voiught performance
I like runaway train but I liked convict cowboy better.  Rodeo action.  Both movies good
We liked both movies. They were good quality and well worth the price.
